### Field Notes

- No odors or discoloration observed

### Compliance Flags

### Events
- WQ-01 datalogger firmware updated to v3.2.1
- Osprey nest activity near WQ-02, no restrictions
- Flow gauge WQ-06 recalibrated after drift check

### Notes
- Day 12 monitoring. Cr readings at WQ-03: 17 ug/L. Upstream stations WQ-01, WQ-02 within baseline.
